document_data.name: Netherskull
document_data.mainbody: '''Netherskull''' was a [[death tyrant]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Many years before the [[1492 DR|Year of Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR]], a [[beholder]] from the [[Underdark]] went into Undermontain. There it settled inside the [[Obstacle Course]] level and turned itself into a death tyrant, renaming itself Netherskull. It fought [[Halaster Blackcloak]] but the Mad Mage prevailed. However, Halaster decided not to destroy Netherskull, instead turning it into a dungeon guardian. Netherskull became the lord of the Obstacle Course level permitting Halaster to install his new magical traps here.

Around [[1392 DR]], the Netherskull battled the paladin [[Fidelio]], but he returned as a [[ghost]] and fought Netherskull many times.
document_data.Activities: Netherskull resided in its sanctum, where it raised all its defeated foes as [[zombie]]s in its service. Nearby was an immense chasm created by its [[disintegrate]] ray, which Halaster had flooded with lava.
